name: Room Coverage
description:
This data type specifies insurance coverage detail for a room.

Note: Replaces the CM data type used in section 6.5.7.28 IN2-28, as of v 2.5.

fields.name: Room Type
fields.description:
Specifies the room type.

Refer to User-defined Table 0145 - Room Type for suggested values.

fields.name: Coverage Amount
fields.description: Attention: The PTA.3 component was deprecated as of v2.5 and the detail was withdrawn and removed from the standard as of v2.7.  Refer to 2.A.64.4, "Money or Percentage".

fields.name: Money Or Percentage
fields.description: Specifies an amount that may be either currency or a percentage.
